metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35116 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** jackson-databind through 2.15.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact via a crafted object that uses cyclic dependencies. NOTE: the vendor's perspective is that this is not a valid vulnerability report, because the steps of constructing a cyclic data structure and trying to serialize it cannot be achieved by an external attacker.

notes.Note: sbeattie> attack vector of a crafted string disputed by upstream

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
